title: German court sentences ISIS bride to 10 years in prison for allegedly letting Yazidi girl kept as slave die of thirst
content:
1. German court sentences ISIS bride to 10 years in prison for allegedly letting Yazidi girl kept as slave die of thirst  CBS News
  2. German IS woman jailed for Yazidi girl's death in Iraq  BBC News
  3. German court convicts ISIS bride for 'crimes against humanity' in death of 5-year-old Yazidi 'slave'  The Washington Post
  4. German Woman Convicted of a Crime Against Humanity in Death of Yazidi Child  The New York Times
  5. German ISIS bride sentenced to prison for role in slave child's death  Yahoo News

localize.title: ドイツの裁判所、奴隷として飼われていたヤジディ教徒の少女を喉の渇きで死なせたとされるISISの花嫁に10年の懲役刑を宣告
德国法院判处ISIS新娘10年监禁，据称她让作为奴隶的雅兹迪女孩渴死了
德國法院判處ISIS新娘10年監禁，據稱她讓作爲奴隸的雅茲迪女孩渴死了
